case.title: Button
case.description: The Functions for the Button control:

case.title: B Directive
case.description: Sets the border style for a button.

case.title: I Directive
case.description: Defines an image to place on a button.

case.title: O Directive
case.description: Specifies the formatting of a button's label.

case.title: OF Directive
case.description: Specifies the formatting of a button's label when the button has focus.

case.title: T Directive
case.description: Defines bubble help for a button.

case.title: Combo Box
case.description: A Function for the Combo Box control:

case.title: A Directive
case.description: Displays bubble help containing the possible entries, calculated from what has been typed into the field.

case.title: Dynamic Text
case.description: The Functions for the Dynamic Text control:

case.title: H Directive
case.description: Causes the line spacing of dynamic text to be calculated based on the actual font being used.

case.title: O Directive
case.description: Specifies the formatting of the text.

case.title: O Directive {B} Operator
case.description: Specifies the background colors.

case.title: O Directive {C} Operator
case.description: Specifies the foreground colors.

case.title: Embedded Dialog
case.description: A Function for the Embedded Dialog control:

case.title: S Directive
case.description: Makes the embedded dialog scrollable.

case.title: List Box
case.description: The Functions for the List Box control:

case.title: C Directive
case.description: Defines the multiple column structure of a multi-column list box.

case.title: D Directive
case.description: Causes the line spacing in a list box to be adjusted automatically for the point size of the type being displayed.

case.title: E Directive
case.description: Defines a multiple selection list box using standard Windows conventions for selecting multiple items.

case.title: F Directive
case.description: References the name of a character variable containing an owner draw format string to be applied when the list box is loaded. It is used when creating resizable column list boxes. F- a special directive to turn off the focus rectangle that surrounds the item in the list with focus.

case.title: H Directive
case.description: Allows horizontal scrolling in a list box.

case.title: I Directive
case.description: Defines an image to place in a list box.

case.title: KE Directive
case.description: Defines a record list edit combo box.

case.title: KL Directive
case.description: Defines a record list list box.

case.title: M Directive
case.description: Defines a multiple selection list box. The multi-select behavior requires you to click an item to select or deselect.

case.title: ME Directive
case.description: Causes a multiple selection list box to return the item with focus at the beginning of the list. The multi-select behavior requires you to Shift+Click or Ctrl+Click.

case.title: MW Directive
case.description: Populates a list box with the selections of a Multi-Select List Box.

case.title: O Directive
case.description: Allows you to format the entries in a List Box control.

case.title: {@} Operator
case.description: Selects text from the input value in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: {B} Operator
case.description: Specifies background colors in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: {C} Operator
case.description: Specifies foreground colors in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: {F} Operator
case.description: Specifies font, point size, and style in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: {I} Operator
case.description: Specifies an image in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: {T} Operator
case.description: Specifies a tab in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: R Directive
case.description: Defines that a list box will have a specific number of lines, regardless of the point size of the text in the list box.

case.title: T Directive
case.description: Defines bubble help for a list box.

case.title: Macro Expansion Symbol
case.description: The Functions for the Macro Expansion Symbol control:

case.title: Macro Expansion Symbol
case.description: Allows a Record List or Tree List control to read its formatting instructions from a variable.

case.title: Radio Button
case.description: The Functions for the Radio Button control:

case.title: B Directive
case.description: Sets the border style for a button.

case.title: I Directive
case.description: Defines an image to place on a radio button.

case.title: T Directive
case.description: Defines bubble help for a radio button.

case.title: Rich Text Field
case.description: The Functions for the Rich Text Field control:

case.title: K Directive
case.description: Displays formatted editable text in scrollable window with a ruler at its top.

case.title: N Directive
case.description: Displays formatted editable text in scrollable window.

case.title: R Directive
case.description: Displays text in a static, read-only scrollable window.

case.title: S Directive
case.description: Displays text in a static, non-scrollable window.

case.title: Static Text
case.description: The Functions for the control:

case.title: H Directive
case.description: Specifies that width (character) and height (line) calculations will be performed using the currently specified font and point size.

case.title: O Directive
case.description: Allows you to format static text.

case.title: {B} Operator
case.description: Specifies background colors in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: {C} Operator
case.description: Specifies foreground colors in a list box owner draw string.

case.title: {F} Operator
case.description: Specifies font, point size, and style in an owner draw string.

case.title: {I} Operator
case.description: Adds an image into a static text in an owner draw string.

case.title: J Directive
case.description: Positions the labels of the tab control.

case.title: O Directive
case.description: Formats the labels of a tab control.

case.title: O Directive {@@} Operator
case.description: Specifies that the text contains embedded formatting commands.

case.title: R Directive
case.description: Defines the number of tab rows to display.

case.title: Text Box
case.description: Text Box functions:

case.title: + Directive
case.description: Defines a text box with auto advance.

case.title: * Directive
case.description: Defines the text box whose text will be auto-selected.

case.title: A Directive
case.description: Allows a text box to accept a tab as a character, as opposed to moving the cursor to the next control.

case.title: A5W Directive
case.description: Converts the text box into an editor for A5W pages.

case.title: F Directive
case.description: The F directive provides formatting for a time or date value.

case.title: I Directive
case.description: Converts the text box into a Interactive Window.

case.title: L Directive
case.description: Converts the text box into a Code Editor.

case.title: K Directive
case.description: Keep text highlighted even when the control loses focus.

case.title: M Directive
case.description: Creates a multi-line text box.

case.title: N Directive
case.description: Causes the Change event to fire only when the control loses focus. Normally, the Change event fires as soon as the value in the control changes.

case.title: P Directive
case.description: Hides input to the text box, allowing it to be used to capture passwords.

case.title: P= Directive
case.description: Creates a smart field.

case.title: R Directive
case.description: Makes a text box read-only.

case.title: S Directive
case.description: Creates a spin control.

case.title: TF Directive
case.description: Indicates that the following data is a time or date value.

case.title: V Directive
case.description: Creates a vertical scroll bar.

case.title: W Directive
case.description: Creates a word-wrapped a multi-line text box.

case.title: Tree
case.description: Tree Functions:

case.title: D Directive
case.description: Defines the separator between data elements within each line of the input string.

case.title: I Directive
case.description: Specifies image used in a tree control.

case.title: S Directive
case.description: Specifies whether to draw boxes and lines.

case.title: X Directive
case.description: Allows you to dynamically populate the branches of a tree control with function calls.
